fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Unlock the true potential of a player, they will be converted into their respective Unseen role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you sucessfully convert retain their original goal and cannot access the Unseen factional chat.
- You will not know when this works.
- If the role isn't a Town role or has no Unseen variant, You will heal them.
